deadlands-classic.title: Deadlands Classic
deadlands-classic.description: A Game System for running games of Deadlands Classic: Weird West, Deadlands Classic: Hell On Earth, and/or Deadlands Classic: Lost Colony via Foundry VTT.

game-world.name: Game World
game-world.hint: Which Deadlands Classic Game is being played: Weird West, Hell On Earth, or Lost Colony.
